channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Search’s New AI Overviews Will Soon Have Ads
item.description: Google is set to start mixing ads into its new AI-generated search answers. It’s a test of how the company’s biggest revenue stream can adapt to the a...

item.title: The ‘vote Trump’ spam that hit Bluesky in May came from decentralized rival Nostr
item.description: The spam reached Bluesky by first crossing over two other decentralized networks: Mastodon and Nostr. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For pers...

item.title: Google Taps AI to Show Shoppers How Clothes Fit Different Bodies
item.description: A new breed of online ad allows brands to pay Google to offer shoppers AI-generated images that show how items of clothing would look on different ski...

item.title: There’s a real appetite for a fintech alternative to QuickBooks
item.description: Welcome to TechCrunch Fintech! This week, we’re looking at the continued fallout from Synapse’s bankruptcy, how Layer wants to disrupt SMB accounting,...

item.title: AI Is a Black Box. Anthropic Figured Out a Way to Look Inside
item.description: What goes on in artificial neural networks work is largely a mystery, even to their creators. But researchers from Anthropic have caught a glimpse.

item.title: Bill Gates-backed wind startup AirLoom is raising $12M, filings reveal
item.description: The company is hoping to produce electricity at $13 per megawatt hour, which would be more than 50% cheaper than traditional onshore wind. © 2024 Tech...

item.title: 8 Best Electric Toothbrushes (2024): Cheap, Smart, Kids, and Alternatives
item.description: These rechargeable and battery-powered models put better oral hygiene within easy reach.

item.title: WitnessAI is building guardrails for generative AI models
item.description: Generative AI makes stuff up. It can be biased. Sometimes it spits out toxic text. So can it be “safe”? Rick Caccia, the CEO of WitnessAI, believes it...

item.title: Blackmagic's Cinema Camera 6K Is Currently $1,000 Off
item.description: The full-frame Cinema Camera 6K is seeing a rare $1,000 price cut, bringing it down to just $1,575 for the camera body.

item.title: French AI startup H raises $220M seed round
item.description: It’s not often that you hear about a seed round above $10 million. H, a startup based in Paris and previously known as Holistic AI, has announced a $2...
